security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation with no executable code, network calls, or file system access. No security risks detected.

content.user_title: Enhance Image Quality with AI Processing
content.value_statement: Blurry screenshots and low-resolution images hurt your professional image. This skill uses AI to upscale, sharpen, and optimize your visuals for crystal-clear presentations and documentation.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes image quality metrics including resolution and sharpness
Intelligently upscales images while preserving details
Reduces compression artifacts and visual noise
Batch processes multiple images in folders
Preserves originals as backups with -original suffix
Optimizes images for specific platforms (web, print, social media)
limitations: Requires actual image processing implementation to function
Best results with digital images and screenshots
Cannot restore severely corrupted or pixelated images
Processing time increases with image resolution

use_cases.title: Blog Screenshot Enhancement
use_cases.description: Enhance UI screenshots and technical images before publishing blog posts or tutorials for professional-quality visuals.

use_cases.title: Presentation Image Optimization
use_cases.description: Upscale and sharpen images for keynote presentations, ensuring crisp visuals on large screens and projectors.

use_cases.title: Platform-Specific Image Prep
use_cases.description: Optimize images for different social platforms with proper sizing and quality settings for maximum engagement.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Image Enhancement
prompt_templates.prompt: Enhance the quality of screenshot.png to make it sharper and clearer for my documentation

prompt_templates.title: Batch Processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Improve the quality of all PNG files in this folder for my presentation

prompt_templates.title: Specific Resolution
prompt_templates.prompt: Upscale this image to 4K resolution while maintaining quality for large screen display

prompt_templates.title: Social Media Optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Enhance this screenshot and optimize it for LinkedIn post with proper sizing and sharpness

output_examples.input: Improve the image quality of screenshot-2024.png
output: Current specs: 1920x1080, PNG format, slight blur detected
Enhancements applied: Upscaled to 2560x1440, sharpened edges, enhanced text clarity

best_practices: Always specify the intended use case (web, print, social media) for optimal settings
Process originals first, then apply additional enhancements to already-improved versions
Use PNG format for quality-critical images, JPG for smaller file sizes
anti_patterns: Don't repeatedly enhance the same image - quality degrades with multiple processing cycles
Avoid enhancing already high-quality images - may introduce artifacts
Don't use aggressive upscaling beyond 2-3x original size - results become unrealistic

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer: PNG, JPG, JPEG, WebP, and most common image formats. PNG is recommended for best quality results.

faq.question: Is there a file size limit?
faq.answer: Images up to 50MB can be processed. Larger files may take longer but will complete successfully.

faq.question: Can I integrate this into my automated workflow?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill works with Claude Code and can be scripted for batch processing entire directories.

faq.question: Is my image data safe?
faq.answer: All processing happens locally. Your images are not uploaded or stored on external servers.

faq.question: The enhanced image looks overprocessed - how do I fix this?
faq.answer: Use more conservative settings or process the original image with lighter enhancement parameters.

faq.question: How does this compare to other image enhancement tools?
faq.answer: This skill is optimized for screenshots and UI elements, making it ideal for technical documentation.
